<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Report from user:
The refresh/apply button behave in an inconsistent when using the filter bar or the filter widget, see screenshots:
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1261626/79556997-1eeb0f00-80a2-11ea-8ded-eb96bfb0f242.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1261626/79556721-c3b91c80-80a1-11ea-883c-776a14d4928a.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
When clicking apply, the button should consistently change to refresh to let the user know that all changes were applied and that they are viewing latest data.
